item.title: 10 Darkest Plot Twists In The MCU
item.description: The MCU features many consequential plot reveals and twists, but some of its darkest serve as a reminder of how grounded the franchise can be.

item.title: 10 Absurd Star Wars Ideas We're So Glad George Lucas Cut
item.description: These 10 unused Star Wars concepts prove that even George Lucas had some ideas for the franchise that were downright absurdâ€”and luckily weren't used.

item.title: Meet Me Next Christmas Soundtrack Guide: Every Song & When They Play In Netflix's Rom-Com
item.description: Meet Me Next Christmas is a fun, toe-tapping Netflix Christmas rom-com with a fantastic soundtrack featuring the pop acapella group Pentatonix.
